myfoodora

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • myfoodora.User
      • myfoodora.Manager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Manager
extends User
implements java.io.Serializable
    Managers oversee the system. They add/remove users and set the general parameters of the system.
    See Also:
